channel.title: CVE Feed for WPChill -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPChill -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1083|2024-03-13T15:26:54.362Z -- wpchill -- Simple Restrict
item.description: The Simple Restrict plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.6 via the REST API. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to bypass the plugin's restrictions to extract post titles and content

item.title: CVE-2024-32429|2024-04-15T06:28:38.392Z -- WPChill -- Remove Footer Credit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPChill Remove Footer Credit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Remove Footer Credit: from n/a through 1.0.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-30501|2024-03-29T14:06:52.184Z -- WPChill -- Download Monitor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in WPChill Download Monitor.This issue affects Download Monitor: from n/a through 4.9.4.
